item.title: DPD delivery van abandoned, 8th November
item.description:
A DPD delivery van has been badly parked in the same spot for many days, taking up spaces for residents. It is damaged and looks either stolen or broken down. DPD not nterested and not willing to investigate what the vehicle is doing ramdomly parked on a residential road for such a long time.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 19, Wood Vale, Muswell Hill, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Loose paving slab and hole on pavement caused me to trip, 8th November
item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Terrace Road, Hackney, London
